forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by increasing clouds with showers developing this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun this morning followed by increasing clouds with showers developing this afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly this evening. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early giving way to clouds and a few showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.
